query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `linkedin_credit_usage` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL,
  `recruiterId` int NOT NULL,
  `creditsUsed` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 1,
  `creditsRemaining` int,
  `creditLimit` int,
  `usageType` enum('inmail','profile_view','search') NOT NULL,
  `linkedinInmailId` int,
  `linkedinProfileId` int,
  `description` varchar(500),
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updatedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  CONSTRAINT `linkedin_credit_usage_id` PRIMARY KEY(`id`),
  CONSTRAINT `linkedin_credit_usage_recruiterId_fk` FOREIGN KEY (`recruiterId`) REFERENCES `recruiters`(`id`),
  CONSTRAINT `linkedin_credit_usage_inmailId_fk` FOREIGN KEY (`linkedinInmailId`) REFERENCES `linkedin_inmails`(`id`),
  CONSTRAINT `linkedin_credit_usage_profileId_fk` FOREIGN KEY (`linkedinProfileId`) REFERENCES `linkedin_profiles`(`id`)
)
